mapper.select: select enquiry_bills.id as id,code,user_id,member_id,status,enquiry_bills.create_time as create_time, enquiry_bills.update_time as update_time,update_user,quoted_time, user_name AS userName,company_full_name as companyFullName,area_full as areaFull, user.contact_mobile as contactMobile, user.contact_name as contactName, updateUser.name as updateUserName, member.name as quotedName from enquiry_bills left join user on user_id = user.id left join member updateUser on update_user = updateUser.id left join member on member_id = member.id WHERE enquiry_bills.id = #{id}
mapper.update:
update enquiry_bills
code = #{code},
user_id = #{userId},
member_id = #{memberId},
status = #{status},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
update_user = #{updateUser},

where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select distinct b.id, b. code, b.user_id, b.member_id, b.status, b.create_time from enquiry_bills b left outer join enquiry_commoditys c on b.id = c.bills_id where b.user_id=#{userId}
and c.commodity_name like "%"#{commodityName}"%"

and DATE_FORMAT(b.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(#{endDate},INTERVAL 1 DAY),'%Y-%m-%d')
